metadata.title: CVE-2023-27783 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue found in TCPreplay tcprewrite v.4.4.3 allows a remote attacker tocause a denial of service via the tcpedit_dlt_cleanup function atplugins/dlt_plugins.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-27783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.4.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.4').
